metadata.title: CVE-2016-7118 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: fs/fcntl.c in the "aufs 3.2.x+setfl-debian" patch in the linux-imagepackage 3.2.0-4 (kernel 3.2.81-1) in Debian wheezy mishandles F_SETFL fcntlcalls on directories, which allows local users to cause a denial of service(NULL pointer dereference and system crash) via standard filesystemoperations, as demonstrated by scp from an AUFS filesystem.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
